title: First Experiences Scaling a Meteor App
description: I recently went through the challenge and ordeal of having to scale my Meteor app. It’s a project that had already been running in production for about a year. This summer the app became a lot more popular with thousands of preseason signups. My initial setup could no longer handle the load and I was faced with a scaling problem that had to be solved quickly.

title: Some Lesser Known TypeScript Features
description: In the past few years, TypeScript has become a popular way to write JavaScript apps. The language is immense and can do a lot of things. Here’s a short list of some rarer TypeScript features you may not be aware of to help with your development

title: Techniques for Fixing npm Packages
description: If you’re a Javascript you likely make use of many npm packages. There are times a package has a bug or doesn’t do exactly what you want. This post details a few different ways to work around this.
